# dataValidation

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Harrison4192/dataValidation/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Harrison4192/dataValidation/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of dataValidation is to provide functions for validating the structure and properties of data frames.

## Installation

You can install the released version of dataValidation from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("dataValidation")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Harrison4192/dataValidation")
```
